posts.post_content: Looking for this in an SGC 20, 10, or A so long as the card still has decent eye appeal.  Would also take in a PSA or BVG equivalent.  Thanks.

Still looking.  If you have this with a better grade than I indicated and are willing to sell, please let me know what you have and bow much you're looking for it. Who knows maybe I'll splurge a bit for the right card :D
